RelatedSentence: Microsoft is hosting an event about its Surface tablet line in New York City tomorrow at 11 am Eastern .
The company is widely expected to announce some new Surface hardware , the first since the Surface 2 and Surface Pro 2 were unveiled back in late September .
Current rumors suggest that we 'll get a Surface Mini out of the event , a 7 - or 8 - inch tablet that runs Windows RT and may or may not include a digitizer pen .
